content.html: Nothing like a big tech conference to remind you what men in tech think about the rest of us. Them: “You’re in client services?” Me: “Not exactly.” Other them: “You don’t seem that technical.” Me: “I wrote the whole damn session.”
content.value:
Nothing like a big tech conference to remind you what men in tech think about the rest of us.

Them: “You’re in client services?”

Me: “Not exactly.”

Other them: “You don’t seem that technical.” 

Me: “I wrote the whole damn session.”
